title: WhatsAppâ€™s Message Reactions feature could get support for more emoji reactions soon
content:
WhatsApp has been working on adding support for emoji message reactions for quite a while now. We first learned about the feature back in August last year, and it has since been spotted in various stages of completion in WhatsApp beta releases for iOS and Android. Last month, WhatsApp finally started rolling out Message Reactions

The post WhatsApp’s Message Reactions feature could get support for more emoji reactions soon appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp is working on an update for its Message Reactions feature which might let users add more emoji reactions to the reactions panel.
